alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 10:31PM MST until December 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, and the Wet Mountain Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
